alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 6:12PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central St. Louis County through 645 PM CDT... At 612 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Whiteface Reservoir, or 35 miles east of Hibbing, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wolf Lake, Brimson, Whiteface Reservoir, Comstock Lake, Markham, and Pequaywan Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
